thread.title: Argos’ Kevin Elliott thankful to be back, but ‘family always comes first’

author: DAN RALPH
title: Argos’ Kevin Elliott thankful to be back, but ‘family always comes first’
text:

Keep me logged in Toronto Argonauts’ Kevin Elliott, right, has 42 catches for 551 yards and is tied for third among CFL receivers with eight touchdown catches. (Jeff McIntosh/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Argos’ Kevin Elliott thankful to be back, but ‘family always comes first’ DAN RALPH
